properties.address: The Chapel Project, Ash Vale, Surrey GU12 3AY
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 30th July 2025** Every Summer the local churches get together to offer our community "Picnic and Play" on Wednesdays in the holidays at The Chapel in Ash Vale. Text to book, for a free picnic, a warm welcome, and lots of ways to be creative from sandcastles to clay models, from colouring to chess, from disco dancing to rock painting, and there is plenty to do in the Community Garden too. All are welcome. Booking essential so we can cater 07730 609446. Dates for 2025: Wednesday 30 July / 6th Aug / 13th Aug / 20th Aug 2025 11:30-15:00.
properties.title: Picnic and Play in the Holidays
